about_the_game:
In a world doomed to the tyrant of the great evil Dark Lord, the guild of Ezerath recruits you to eliminate the Dark Lord. To get to the Dark Lord you must first clear each of his 10 Grand Generals dungeons, obtaining loot and experience along the way. During your grind you can also stop to help the NPC's of Ezerath by completing unique side quests for other fun rewards. The open world also has secrets, extra mini-bosses, events, and enemy loot drops for you to discover. Do you have what it takes to explore and save the land of Ezerath?

By playing the DEMO, you get access to the first dungeon, and the open overworld!
